title: How to Draw Boxing Gloves

steps.headline: Draw an egg shape on your paper, but leave the top part open.
Add an oval on the left side, draw it a little inside the first shape.
steps.description: This will be for the thumb.

steps.headline: Now for the top part that is fixed on your wrist, draw a rectangular.
steps.description: This is the basic shape of your glove.

steps.headline: Add some details.
steps.description: Make the glove more realistic by rounding the edges, try to give it a more flexible look.

steps.headline: Repeat the first 4 steps for the second glove, the left one.
steps.description: You can position the next glove above or below the first glove, or on the same line.

steps.headline: Erase all the guideline and refine it a bit if needed.
Connect  them with laces and hang them on the wall.
